description: The app works great and all the nice features from pycharm are available for DS work. It helps me a lot.
I use it on a daily basis
summary: Does everything a ML researcher needs

description: The best IDE for Data Science !

I am rating this app 5 stars but I do feel like there are a lot of stuff to be considered before actually start suggest it to others. But still, IT IS AMAZING.

Two ugly problems I'm facing right now: 
1. QWERTY/AZERTY keyboards: I live in France but I'm not french. I've bought an AZERTY keyboard but I change the language to English and it's QWERTY layout. for some reason when I try anyshortcut like CTRL+ Z DataSpell deosn't "change" the keyboard layout. (so I code using QWERTY layout but use shortcuts with AZERTY) which is a little annoeying.
2. For some reason the R compiler stopped working and I had to re-download RStudio to finish my work. I don't usually use R so it's not that problem but you should see what's the problem.
summary: Great app (easy 5 stars) but have many bugs at the moment

description: You have to buy a license to use this app!
